title: Entity Type Column Schema
description: A definition of the entity type column

visibleByDefault.description: Indicates if the column should be shown by default when the entity is viewed.

isCustomField.description: Indicates if the column belongs to the custom field.

isIdColumn.description: Indicates if the column is part of the unique identifier for this entity type

hidden.description: Indicates if the field is hidden in UI

essential.description: Indicates if a column is crucial to the definition of an entity type

joinsTo.description: A set of columns which this column may be joined to

originalEntityTypeId.description: [Internal only, not for definitions] The simplest entity type that this column is derived from
